Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.network

Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.network.GameClient
public class GameClient extends Object
The main Client-side class handling network communication with the Server This class wraps around the Socket connected with the Server to provide easy access to methods such as sending messages. It supports async message reception and handles errors in case of network timeouts or match termination

  • Constructor Details

    • GameClient

      private GameClient(int serverPort, String serverIP, boolean isGUI)
      Initialize the Client instance with netwrok parameters and the UI mode
      Parameters:
      serverPort - (type int) The port on the server open to accepting connections with the client
      serverIP - (type String) The server IP address
      isGUI - (type boolean) Whether the client is in GUI mode or CLI

  • Method Details

    • createClient

      public static void createClient(String serverIP, int serverPort, boolean isGUI)
      Static method used to create a GameClient object, if such object does not already exist
      Parameters:
      serverPort - (type int) The port on the server open to accepting connections with the client
      serverIP - (type String) The server IP address
      isGUI - (type boolean) Whether the client is in GUI mode or CLI

    • shared

      public static GameClient shared()
      Accesses the Singleton instance of the client
      Returns:
      The singleton client instance

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer() throws IOException
      This method opens the socket with the server (if not already opened and active) and starts the Thread used to asynchronously read from the Socket
      Throws:
      IOException - When the default error handling behavior, which closes the socket and deallocates internal objects, fails

    • startPongTimeoutTimer

      public void startPongTimeoutTimer()
      Starts a Timer for intercepting disconnections with the Server on the Client side. This allows the client to be notified when the network connection is down and the server cannot send the termination message

    • isTerminationMessage

      private boolean isTerminationMessage(NetworkMessage message)
      Checks if a network message signals termination
      Parameters:
      message - The network message to check
      Returns:
      Whether a network message signals termination

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(NetworkMessage message)
      Sends the message to the Server synchronously using the TCP Socket
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send

    • didReceiveMessage

      private void didReceiveMessage(NetworkMessage message)
      Dispatches an appropriate notification depending on the received message type
      Parameters:
      message - The received network message

    • teardown

      public void teardown()
      Closes the connection with the server

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Tears down the connection with the server and kills the program
